reviewText: My children are spread very far apart so I had all the early shows on VHS.Meanwhile, I switched to DVD for the younger children.Our favorites are the early shows and buying each on DVD seemed excessive.This collection was a God send!  It had every video we needed!My kids LOVE these videos and so do I!
summary: So So So happy with this purchase
Title: Veggietales: All the Shows, Vol. 1, 1993-1999

reviewText: The classic Veggie Tales are simply wonderful!!  Husband & I are 50+, and as soon as they arrived, watched them one-a-night and wished there were more!  What we'd also love to see is a complete collection of all the Silly Songs, but that hasn't been done yet.
Title: Veggietales: All the Shows, Vol. 1, 1993-1999

reviewText: My toddler loves these movies, his 5th word ever was Bob. He stays glued and brings the box to us. They have good messages and catchy tunes too.
Title: Veggietales: All the Shows, Vol. 1, 1993-1999

reviewText: My grandson, 3,  loves these characters and yells out the theme song with every episode. I love them because of the values they portray for every day situations. Entertaining for children and adults alike. I loved the fact that i could get all these episodes in one place. I highly recommend the show.
summary: If you like to talk to tomatos....
Title: Veggietales: All the Shows, Vol. 1, 1993-1999

reviewText: I CHOSE THIS ITEM, BECAUSE I LOVE THE VEGGIE TELLS, I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS ITEM TO EVERYONE OF ALL AGES, ITEM PACKED GREAT.
Title: Veggietales: All the Shows, Vol. 1, 1993-1999

reviewText: When I was a kid growing up in the 90s, I was a Veggie Tales fanatic! I can still remember all the songs by heart! The Volume 1 collection encompasses all the episodes I remember as a kid. I just gave this to my son for Christmas, and I'm so excited to watch them with him... cause I still love this show!
summary: Sharing my childhood with my own Child!
Title: Veggietales: All the Shows, Vol. 1, 1993-1999

reviewText: Thank you for a great DVD collection.  My grand son loves them and they are so much better viewing than the violent and evil cartoons on TV!!
Title: Veggietales: All the Shows, Vol. 1, 1993-1999
